posts.post_content:
Nice card of the Boston Red Sox centerfielder who is in the HOF.

$SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S. with payment via personal check / money order / cashier's check. Old school, man.  References available if needed, just ask.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

More prewar cards available here:

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
